revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: A series of adventures in the course of a voyage up the Red-Sea, on the coasts of Arabia and Egypt; and of a route through the desarts of Thebais, in the year 1777:..."
revision.text: Possibly: A series of adventures in the course of a voyage up the Red-Sea, on the coasts of Arabia and Egypt; and of a route through the desarts of Thebais, in the year 1777: With a supplement of a voyage from Venice to Latichea; and of a route through the desarts of Arabia, by Aleppo, Bagdad, and the Tygris to Busrah, in the years 1780 and 1781. In letters to a lady / By Eyles Irwin, Esq. in the service of the Honble the East India Company. Illustrated with maps and cuts. (By Irwin, Eyles). (London : Printed for J. Dodsley, 1787). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1420577~S1
